description: Leading a team of 5 engineers building enterprise observability platforms for 1,000+ production applications
Architected ML-driven incident classification system with 99% accuracy, reducing triage time by 80%
Built observability dashboards and led AIOps migration, reducing alert noise by 60%
Mentored 200+ senior engineering students through capstone projects; delivered lectures on software architecture
Modernized legacy ASP.NET app to React/MVC; built automated API testing with 100% coverage
Developed 3 production features for enterprise point-of-sale platform
